page.title: 06DOMESDAY SURVEY.
page.content: The followings survey sheet was sent out to 150 homes.We had 66 returns. Q1.Did you choose to live in the village because; a)You like it. 63% b)Its location. 39% Q2.If you live in the village because of its location; a)Is it because it is in the country. 48% b)Is it because it is close to motorways? 6% c)Is it just for peace and quiet? 15% Q3.Do you think there is sufficient means of public transport? YES 30% NO 70% Q4)Do you consider it is essential to have a car or a means of transport? YES 94% NO 6% Q5)Do you need a car to a)Go to work 78%
